doc.abstracts: In November 1991, Abdul Hakim Nusantara interviewed on behalf of the World Bank Group Archives oral history program by John Lewis, Richard Webb, Devesh Kapur. This transcript concerns serious negotiations between Indonesia with the World Bank and the International Monetary Fund in 1968; and the World Bank’s concentration on infrastructure in early ‘70s.
